titleStmt.title: The fourth boke of Virgill, intreating of the loue betweene Aeneas and Dido, translated into English, and drawne into a straũge metre by Henrye late Earle of Surrey, worthy to be embraced..
Aeneis. Liber 4. English
titleStmt.author: Virgil.
Surrey, Henry Howard, Earl of, 1517?-1547.

publicationStmt.publisher: by John Day, for William Awen, dwellyng in Pater noster rowe, at the sygne of the Cocke.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Title within illustrated border (not found in McK. & Ferg.).
Imperfect: faded spots, print bleeding and show-through.
Reproduction of original in: Carl H. Pforzheimer Library.
